articles.title: Live updates: Israel and Iran enter shaky ceasefire as Trump accuses both of violations - The Washington Post
articles.summary: Israel and Iran enter shaky ceasefire as Trump accuses both of violations President Donald Trump on June 24 used an expletive and accused both Israel and Iran of violating a ceasefire agreement hours after it took effect. (Video: The Washington Post) Israel and Iran entered into a shaky ceasefire Tuesday morning, bringing an uncertain end to 12 days of fighting.
